Package com.ooyala.android.ads.vast

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompanionAds
    A class that represents VAST CompanionAds element
    Constants
    Created by zchen on 2/29/16.
    Icon
    Created by zchen on 2/25/16.
    NonLinear
    A class that represents NonLinear element
    NonLinearAds
    A class that represents NonLinearAds element
    Resource
    A representation of VAST resource.
    TimeOffset
    This class is used to hold a VAST 3.0 time offset value.
    VASTAdPlayer
    A MoviePlayer which helps render VAST advertisements
    VASTAdSpot
    A model of an VAST Ad spot, which can be played during video playback
    VASTHelper
    This is a static helper class to deserialize a VMAP XML document into VMAP ad spots.
    VastParser
    Class for exposing VAST utils
    VMAPAdSpot
    A model of a VMAP Ad spot, which extends VAST Ad spot with additional VMAP attributes
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CompanionAds.RequiredType  
    Resource.Type  
    TimeOffset.Type
